messages.content: ... [NAME] derangement syndrome sufferer spotted. What drivel you crazy lunatics say... The lies and falsehoods along with the out of place fearmongering is getting really annoying...
Super dumb that people are downvoting you for asking a question in good faith.
They’re just idiots parking there. No clue that it is a designated bike lane.
>the silent majority This is the most ignorant thing I've read so far today
I just say I don't know shit. I'm just a ape man on a rock.
For unrelated reasons, school is another mess. But vaccine injury in definitely represented through absurd levels of special ed.
I'm just gonna take this as a metaphor for idiot units.
Here in America too. Those counter protesting fascist get thrown in jail and pepper sprayed like animals. It makes no sense that this happens.
Well that sucks. But still if you refuses the test you'd probably have been charged, which is worse.
0.1% is a 1 in a thousand chance there, dumbass.
So get a job and leave. It's just going to get worse. First the tv then you. Get out while you can
Alright now you're intentionally misinterpreting what I say. Whatever.
You're not really pissing anyone off. Mostly we just pity you.
